column1: Art Institute of Chicago////The Art Institute has my favorite painting in it
column2: a masterpiece by Picasso called The Old Guitarist.  I fought through the crowds and rushed past so many other amazing pieces until I found it.  It was strange
column3: even with all the crowds not many people were stopping by it.  OK by me
column4: I got to stand and stare at it for a long time
column5: just silently taking in its beauty.  I was surprised at how large the painting was
column6: I felt so tiny standing by it.  Amazing
column7: truly amazing.  Picasso was such a genius.
